meaning: The storm damaged several buildings.
example: damage'는 (사람, 재산, 평판 등에 가해지는) 물리적이거나 경제적인 '손실'이나 '해악'을 의미하는 명사입니다.\r\n The storm caused significant damage to the company's warehouse.
sentence: The storm may ____ the crops in the field.

meaning: We decided to move. / He decided on a design.
example: decide'는 (여러 가능성을 고려한 후) 최종적인 '선택'이나 '판단'을 내린다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Management has decided to invest in new technology.
sentence: We must ____ on a new plan today.

meaning: Sales declined sharply. / He declined the offer.
example: decline'은 (수량, 가치, 품질 등이) '감소하다'는 의미의 동사, 또는 '감소, 하락'을 의미하는 명사입니다. (제안을 '거절하다'는 뜻도 있음)\r\n There has been a steady decline in the company's profits this year.
sentence: Sales may ____ after the busy season.

meaning: She dedicated her life to helping others.
example: dedicate'는 (형용사형 'dedicated'로) 특정 목적이나 사람만을 위해 '전담하는' 또는 (일이나 신념에) '헌신적인'이라는 의미입니다.\r\n We have a dedicated hotline for technical support.
sentence: She will ____ her time to helping others.

meaning: The manager delegated tasks to staff.
example: delegate'는 (그룹이나 조직을 대신하여 회의나 행사에 참석하는) '대표자'나 '대리인'을 의미하는 명사입니다.\r\n A delegate from each branch will attend the annual meeting.
sentence: The manager will ____ tasks to each team member.

meaning: They delivered the package to the client.
example: deliver'는 (물품, 우편, 연설 등을) 목적지나 대상에게 '운반'하거나 '전달한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The supplies will be delivered to your office by Friday.
sentence: The courier will ____ the package by tomorrow.

meaning: He demonstrated that the theory was valid.
example: demonstrate'는 (제품의 작동 방식 등을) '보여주거나(시연하다)', (사실임을) '분명히 입증한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The presentation will demonstrate the new features of our software.
sentence: Please ____ how the device works.

meaning: The train departs from Seoul for Busan.
example: depart'는 (특히 기차, 비행기 등이) 어떤 장소를 '떠나거나' '출발한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The train for the airport is scheduled to depart from Platform 3.
sentence: The flight will ____ from Gate 5 at noon.

meaning: Success depends on effort.
example: depend'는 (주로 'depend on' 형태로) 다른 요인에 의해 '결정되거나' '의존한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Our shipping times depend on the destination.
sentence: Success will ____ on your effort.

meaning: The painting depicts a rural scene.
example: depict'는 (그림, 차트, 말로) 어떤 것의 모습을 '묘사'하거나 '나타낸다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The graph clearly depicts the increase in monthly web traffic.
sentence: The poster will ____ scenes from daily life.

meaning: He described the view as beautiful.
example: describe'는 (어떤 것이나 사람의 특징에 대해) 말이나 글로 '묘사'하거나 '설명한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Can you describe the main responsibilities of this position?
sentence: Can you ____ what you saw at the event?

meaning: She deserves respect. / He deserves to win.
example: deserve'는 (자신의 행동이나 자질로 인해) (보상, 인정 등을) '받을 만한 자격이 있다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Our employees deserve to be recognized for their hard work.
sentence: He ____ to win after such hard work.

meaning: The team designed a system for students.
example: design'은 (계획에 따라) (제품, 시스템, 계획 등의) 구조나 형태를 '만들거나' '설계한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n This marketing campaign was designed to attract younger customers.
sentence: They will ____ a new logo for the company.

meaning: The area was designated as a park.
example: designate'는 (특정 목적이나 용도를 위해) 장소나 사람을 공식적으로 '지정'하거나 '지명한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The front rows are designated for guests with special needs.
sentence: The board will ____ a leader for the new branch.

meaning: The report detailed the process.
example: detail'은 (전체 중의) '구체적인 항목'이나 '세부 사항'을 의미하는 명사입니다.\r\n Please check the contract details carefully before signing.
sentence: Please ____ your plan in simple steps.

meaning: The test determined that he was qualified.
example: determine'은 (조사 등을 통해) 사실이나 원인을 '확실히 알아내거나', (무엇을 할지) '결정한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We must determine the cause of the equipment malfunction.
sentence: We must ____ the cause of the problem.

meaning: They developed a new product. / The issue developed quickly.
example: develop'는 (신제품, 기술, 전략 등을) '만들거나', (기술, 능력 등을) '발전시킨다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company is developing a new line of eco-friendly products.
sentence: The company plans to ____ a new product line.

meaning: Opinions differ from person to person.
example: differ'는 (성질, 형태, 의견 등에서) '같지 않거나' '다르다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The two reports differ significantly in their conclusions.
sentence: Our opinions may ____ on this issue.

meaning: Please discard old documents.
example: discard'는 (더 이상 쓸모없거나 원하지 않는 것을) '버리거나' '폐기한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please discard any old files that are no longer needed.
sentence: Please ____ old files you don’t need.

meaning: They discontinued the service.
example: discontinue'는 (제품의 생산이나 서비스의 제공을) 영구적으로 '중단한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Production of the model TX-100 will be discontinued next month.
sentence: They decided to ____ the old project.

meaning: Let’s discuss the issue.
example: discuss'는 (어떤 주제에 대해) 공식적으로 '이야기를 나누거나' '논의한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We will discuss the budget proposal at the next meeting.
sentence: Let’s ____ this topic after lunch.

meaning: Please dispose of waste properly.
example: dispose'는 (주로 'dispose of' 형태로) (쓰레기나 불필요한 것을) '처리하거나' '버린다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please dispose of all waste materials in the proper containers.
sentence: You must ____ of waste properly.

meaning: He disregarded the warning.
example: disregard'는 (중요한 경고, 조언, 사실 등을) '신경 쓰지 않거나' '무시한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Do not disregard the safety warnings on the equipment.
sentence: He chose to ____ the warning signs.

meaning: They distributed leaflets to visitors.
example: distribute'는 (문서, 물품 등을) 여러 사람에게 나누어 주거나 '배포한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The memos were distributed to all department heads.
sentence: We will ____ flyers to all customers.

meaning: The noise disturbed the students.
example: disturb'는 (다른 사람의 일, 휴식, 집중 등을) '방해하거나' '지장을 준다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the construction noise and ask you not to disturb the workers.
sentence: Don’t ____ the sleeping baby.

meaning: We divided the class into groups.
example: divide'는 (일, 물건, 공간 등을) '두 개 이상의 부분이나 그룹으로' '나눈다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The tasks for the project were divided among the team members.
sentence: Let’s ____ the work among team members.

meaning: I’ll do my best.
example: do'는 (어떤 행동, 임무, 비즈니스 등을) '수행'하거나 '한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We are happy to do business with such a reliable partner.
sentence: We have much to ____, so let’s start now.

meaning: She donated money to charity.
example: donate'는 (특히 자선 단체나 공익을 위해) 돈이나 물품을 '기부'하거나 '기증한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company will donate a portion of its profits to charity.
sentence: They will ____ food and clothes to charity.

meaning: Sales doubled last year. / They doubled production.
example: double'은 (수량이나 크기가) '두 배의'라는 의미의 형용사, 또는 '두 배로 만들거나 두 배가 되다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company's profits have doubled since last year.
sentence: Profits may ____ by next quarter.

meaning: He drew water from the well.
example: draw'는 (관심, 주의, 결론 등을) '끌어당기다'는 의미, 혹은 '그림을 그리다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The new advertisement campaign aims to draw customer attention.
sentence: Let’s ____ a chart to show the results.

meaning: She dropped her bag. / Sales dropped by 10%.
example: drop'은 (액체) '방울'이라는 뜻도 있지만, (가치, 수량, 온도의) '감소'나 '하락'을 의미하는 명사로도 자주 쓰입니다 drop by는 잠깐 들르다.\r\n We have seen a significant drop in customer complaints.
sentence: He will ____ by later to pick up the forms.
